meanings.definition: To give permission for something to happen or be done.
meanings.sent1: My mom will allow me to go to the park with my friends.
meanings.sent2: Please allow me to explain what happened.
meanings.sent3: I will allow the cookies to cool before eating them.
meanings.sent4: The teacher will allow extra time for the students to finish the test.
meanings.sent5: The sign will allow cars to pass through the gate.

meanings.definition: To admit or acknowledge something as valid.
meanings.sent1: I will allow that you were right about the answer.
meanings.sent2: The judge will allow the evidence in court.
meanings.sent3: I must allow that I made a mistake in my calculations.
meanings.sent4: The scientist will allow the new theory to be considered.
meanings.sent5: The company will allow the complaint to be investigated.

meanings.definition: To enable someone to do something.
meanings.sent1: The new software will allow users to edit photos easily.
meanings.sent2: Please allow me to help you with your bags.
meanings.sent3: The key will allow you to open the door.
meanings.sent4: The map will allow you to find your way around the city.
meanings.sent5: The tool will allow you to fix the broken chair.
